channel.title: Webclient
channel.description: So... I followed this tutorial for a webclient & it worked, but little did I know it wasn't an auto cache downloading webclient.. so I still have to dl the cache and put it in my C: for the webclient to even load. How can I make it so that it'll automatically download the cache from my webhost? Help is greatly appreciated.

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Kasparr Kasparr
item.description:
@Kasparr wrote:

Well i’m guessing for the most part it worked because the guy who posted the tutorial is using the same source as me Thanks for that, however I get this error when I compile. I’m not really sure what to make of it. Anybody know?

Kasparscape is loading.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: nullMaps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find th e path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:111) at client.startUp(client.java:9047) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at java.io.File.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.<init>(Update.java:25) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4766) at client.startUp(client.java:9057) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Kasparr Kasparr
item.description:
@Kasparr wrote:

So… I followed this tutorial for a webclient & it worked, but little did I know it wasn’t an auto cache downloading webclient… so I still have to dl the cache and put it in my C: for the webclient to even load. How can I make it so that it’ll automatically download the cache from my webhost? Help is greatly appreciated.
